    • prepareNewGameIfNeeded

      public boolean prepareNewGameIfNeeded()
      Returns:
      boolean checks if game is over; if so, sets the winning team and returns false (only possible for differenzler) if not, prepares new game (resetting Wiis and Score, setting new startingPlayer, deal cards etc.) and returns true
